entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers this morning then 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
